channel.title: [Hyperion]Project Annihilation help me!
channel.description:
I have done everything to get the server running. i enter the 459 cache from the client into data/cache. When i run in Eclipes i get this: [code]Aug 13, 2010 2:04:15 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:15 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:84) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:78) ... 7 more Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions...[/code]
Please help!!!

item.title: [Hyperion]Project Annihilation help me!
item.dc:creator: @Dante112 Dante112
item.description:
@Dante112 wrote:

I have done everything to get the server running. i enter the 459 cache from the client into data/cache. When i run in Eclipes i get this:

Aug 13, 2010 2:04:15 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:15 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:16 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:84) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Dante\Project A\PJA\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:78) ... 7 more Aug 13, 2010 2:04:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions...

Please help!!!
